name: Poland
declaringWar: You are a threat to everyone, so I decided to end you!
attacked: Do you dare to question the Polish army?
defeated: You have successfully erased Poland from the maps, but the Polish spirit will survive forever!
introduction: Welcome to the lands of the Kingdom of Poland.

name: Hungary
declaringWar: It's time to enlarge the Hungarian lands! You'd better give up right away!
attacked: You fool! You don't know what you're up for!
defeated: How is it possible? The Hungarian army was supposed to be unstoppable!
introduction: Hello Stranger. You have just reached the vast lands of the Kingdom of Hungary!
neutralHello: What do you need, my friend?
hateHello: Look, who has honored us with his presence!

name: Belgium
declaringWar: I didn't think it would come to this...
attacked: Ha, the Belgians will resist until the end!
defeated: The Belgians will never be obedient to you.
introduction: Hello, I'm Albert, king of the Belgians. I hope our countries will live in peace.
hateHello: What do you want from us?
tradeRequest: What do you think about our offer?

name: Livonia
declaringWar: Our mighty knights would smash your heretics.
attacked: Ha, the brave knights of order will resist until the end!
defeated: The people of Terra Marianna will never be under your rule.
introduction: Hello, I'm Johannes, archbishop of Riga. I hope our countries will live under the rule of Jesus.
tradeRequest: Would Jesus bless this agreement between us?

name: Romania
declaringWar: Our honorous people would smash you.
attacked: Ha, the brave partisans will resist until the end!
defeated: One day Greater Romania will rise again soon.
introduction: Hello, I'm Carol, king of Valachia, Moldova, Transylvania and Dobruja. I hope our countries will live together in peace.
